data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Dagestan, Russia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dagestan, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 37,706 believers in Dagestan, Russia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Dagestan, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Dagestan who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Chamalal people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help the 37,706 believers in Dagestan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,538,794 lost friends and neighbors.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Dagestan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dagestan, Russia has a population of 2,576,500.

We estimate Dagestan has 37,706 people who might know Jesus, 1,446,143 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,092,651 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Dagestan, Russia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
